election_record.label: New York 1808 Collector, New York, Ward 2

overview.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY), New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), and The New-York Gazette and General Advertiser (New York, NY) use the name Gillian for Gilliam Cornel.

The American Citizen (New York, NY), The Public Advertiser (New York, NY), New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), and The New-York Gazette and General Advertiser (New York, NY) use the spelling Cornell for Gilliam Cornel.
